snippet.title: Carth Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1526430/Carth/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CarthGame
Official teaser release trailer from Deidre Reay Studios and their upcoming multiplayer survival RPG Game Carth. Carth is an intense multiplayer game that will pit you and your allies against a looming evil as well as other players alike. Host your own servers or join Officially hosted ones depending on your style of play. Carth is coming Fall of 2022 to PC. Follow us on twitter and steam to stay close to the action!
